name: The Sims 2
description:
This installer uses a patched version of wine that allows it to run The Sims 2, and also adds certain mods to fix Wine-specific issues with the game.
It is made for the Ultimate Collection version from Origin.
notes: IMPORTANT: READ THE MANUAL AND INSTALL DEPENDENCIES! See https://github.com/lutris/lutris/wiki/Game:-The-Sims-2 - The game will fail to launch with Origin-In-Game enabled. Please disable it in Origin's preferences to launch The Sims 2. - For support, contact @Tannis Root on Linux Gamers Group server.

write_file.content:
boolprop useshaders true
boolProp   createNVidiaWorkaroundTexture false
boolProp   bumpMapping false

content:
files:
- fixes: https://github.com/tannisroot/installer-fixes/raw/master/sims2_fixes.tar.xz
- origin: https://origin-a.akamaihd.net/Origin-Client-Download/origin/legacy/OriginThinSetup.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Origin/Origin.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine Prefix...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Disabling crash dialogs...
    key: ShowCrashDialog
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\WineDbg
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: 0
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Setting version to xp...
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: winxp
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Setting Vertex Shader Model to 2...
    key: MaxShaderModelVS
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000002'
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Setting Pixel Shader Model to 2...
    key: MaxShaderModelPS
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000002'
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2013
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Vcrun 2013
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: vcrun2010
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Vcrun 2010
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- extract:
    dst: "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/My Documents/EA Games/The Sims\u2122 2 Ultimate\
      \ Collection/Downloads"
    file: fixes
- write_file:
    content: 'boolprop useshaders true

      boolProp   createNVidiaWorkaroundTexture false

      boolProp   bumpMapping false

      '
    file: "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/My Documents/EA Games/The Sims\u2122 2 Ultimate\
      \ Collection/Config/userstartup.cheat"
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Origin...
    exclude_processes: Origin.exe OriginClientService.exe
    executable: origin
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    WINE_LARGE_ADDRESS_AWARE: 1
wine:
  version: tkg-sims2-3.21-x86_64
